Name: LU 98 - Landmarks, Old Croton Aqueduct Walk, Bronx (N 240327 HIX)
Title: Resolution affirming the designation by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Old Croton Aqueduct Walk located at 2200 Aqueduct Avenue (Tax Map Block 3210 Lots 1 and 7; Block 3211, p/o Lot 1; Block 3212 Lots 1, 67, and 71; Block 3213, Lots 27, 48, 49, and 70; Block 3214, Lot 33; and Block 3215, Lot 31), Borough of the Bronx, Designation List No. 538/LP-2673 (L.U. No. 98; N 240327 HIX).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
